Description: Tiraz fragment woven in undyed linen; decorative band in tapestry, made of rectangular compartiments bearing stylised vegetal interlacing and motifs in undyed and yellow, green, blue, black and red silk on a red background. Linen weave: Warp: linen, undyed, S, 18/cm Weft: linen, undyed, S, 11/cm Tapestry: Warp: linen, undyed, S, 18/cm Weft: silk, undyed, yellow, green, blue, black and red, I, 60/cm`
Acquisition name: Donated by: Maj William Joseph Myers (executors of)
